title: Magical World Jun
alternative_title: Mahou Sekai no Jun ; 魔法世界の ジュン ; Fairy Tale Manga Magical World Jun
status: Mahou Sekai no Jun ; 魔法世界の ジュン ; Fairy Tale Manga Magical World Jun
description:
Description :
        Jun of Ishinomori's Fantasy World Jun returns, this time as a younger boy. While he may be younger, the sights he sees are as fantastic as ever, taking one on trips throughout different worlds as he tries to make sense of things.Serialized in two magazines, including Sanrio's shojo magazine Lyrica.
